column4: I just got Ubuntu installed on my laptop and when I attempt to play audio, it has a notable crackling sound in it. Also, I still get the crackling with headphone plugged in. Any ideas?
yes. I had it in the last version of ubuntu as well, and thats actually one of the reasons I stopped using ubuntu for a while until I had more time to put into it :), but I'm back now.
have you searched to see if there is an issue with your soundcard? have you reduced volume lvels?
